edu.jhu.rebar

Interface CorpusFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccumuloCorpusFactory, FileCorpusFactory, RiakCorpusFactory

    public interface CorpusFactory
    An interface for creating a "corpus factory", a top level corpus object that can manage corpora in the backend (e.g., corpus creation and deletion).
    Author:
    max
